task.title: Caprese Stuffed Avocados
task.shortdesc: I don't think I can go a day without eating something that has avocado in it or on it. Avocados have become such a fad, everyone loves them. This recipe is to die for and needs to be included in your brunch!

context.p: Below are the ingredients, materials, and steps needed to make this one of a kind dish.

ul.li: 1/2 cup mini marinated mozzarella balls, halved

step.cmd: Scoop out the insides of the avocado, leaving a small amount around the rim.
Diced the scooped out avocado and set aside
In a large bowl add in diced avocado, tomatoes, balsamic, and olive oil. Mix together
Add salt and pepper, mix everything together
Add the mixture to the avocado halves
